name: Jump to Health
description:
Jump to Health is a platform game made for the Mini Jam 128 with theme Health.

The game you will control the little Red Hood, that want to improve her health, so for this you have to collect Health Items and achieve the top of the world.

You can control the little Red Hood with A/D or Arrows for directions, and W/Arrow Up/Space to jump.

Game made by:

Isaac Debiasi

Victor Matheus
